segments.text: I'd like to help pitch in with dinner .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No . I'd like to do something special for you on your birthday .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'd like that . Alright , put on this apron first .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: OK ... Now how can I help , hon ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Hmm , let me see ... Boil some water .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Easy . I could do that with my eyes closed . ( after a while ) Done .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Not bad . Okay , now take some meat and potatoes from the fridge .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: How many potatoes do you need ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Three . And bring four bell peppers .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Now wash them , then dice the potatoes and bell peppers .
segments.speaker: S2
